name: MANUAL BLASTER
description:
A short twin-stick shooter made for the A2B2 Game Jam

Play as Gnorts the Alien, an extraterrestrial New Jerseyan who must use his ray gun to fend off hordes of slimes that want to explode in his face like a champ.

The only way to survive is to harness the power of the Manual Blast, a reality-altering technique that Gnorts learned from his old roommate.
